EmailTemplate.name: Credit Rebill Scripting
EmailTemplate.subject: Credit Rebill - {!Case.Account} - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your request. Please be advised that the attached form must be filled out before we can proceed with the requested credit rebills. Once you have the form filled out, please provide it back to us and we'll coordinate the credit rebills.
Support #: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Click here to go to the request
Thank you,
Account Maintenance Team
